Nerangs.ab: yaθā ahū vairiiō čahār pad ēk ī fradom pad xš́iiaōθananąm hōm ēk bār hunīdan ud pad aŋhəuš ēk bār hunīdan ud pad mazdāi ēk bār hunīdan ud pad dudīgar yaθā ahū vairiiō pad xš́iiaōθananąm dō bār hunīdan pad aŋhəuš dō bār hunīdan pad mazdāi dō bār hunīdan pad sidīgar yaθā ahū vairiiō pad xš́iiaōθananąm sē bār hunīdan pad aŋhəuš sē bār hunīdan pad mazdāi sē bār hunīdan ud abarhāwan gōš bālā abar dāštan ud pad ēk ī čahārom was hāwan frōd kōftan ud škāftan

"(They should recite) the yaθā ahū vairiiō four times. During the first one, he should pound the hōm once at xš́iiaōθananąm, pound it once at aŋhəuš and pound it once at mazdāi. During the second yaθā ahū vairiiō, he should pound the hōm twice at xš́iiaōθananąm, pound it twice at aŋhəuš and pound it twice at mazdāi. During the third yaθā ahū vairiiō, he should pound the hōm three times at xš́iiaōθananąm, pound it three times at aŋhəuš and pound it three times at mazdāi and hold up the abarhāwan to the height of the ears. During the fourth one, he has to strike and hit continuously the hāwan."
